title: Rheumatoid Arthritis Clinical Trial
description:
Description
Rheumatoid self-assessment scores for 302 patients, measured on a five-level
ordinal response scale at three follow-up times.
reference:
Lipsitz, S.R. and Kim, K. and Zhao, L. (1994) Analysis of repeated
categorical data using generalized estimating equations. Statistics in
Medicine, 13, 1149–1163.

parameters.trt:
Treatment group variable, coded as (1) for the placebo
group and (2) for the drug group.
parameters.y:
Self-assessment score of rheumatoid arthritis measured on a
five-level ordinal response scale.
parameters.baseline:
Self-assessment
score of rheumatoid arthritis at the baseline.
parameters.sex:
Coded as (1) for
female and (2) for male.

format: A data frame with 906 observations on the following 7 variables:
